name: The Descendants
description: Ancient multiversal entities that once warred against the Spirit. They exist outside traditional time and space, manipulating lower-dimensional civilizations as pawns. The true antagonists of Redemption of Time, seeking to spread corruption across universes through Conceptual Seeds.

details.form: Shapeshifters and conceptual beings, often appearing as idealized forms
details.weaponry: Conceptual Seeds, consciousness manipulation, multiversal corruption
quotes: We are older than time itself.
Every universe will know our touch.

name: Zero-Homers
description: Cryptic entities mentioned in Death's End who attempted to end the universe by rewriting fundamental physics. They launched attacks on the basic constants of the universe to make it uninhabitable for life - a form of cosmic-scale annihilation beyond mere destruction.

details.weaponry: Universal constant manipulation, physics law alteration

name: Trisolaran Civilization
description: A technologically advanced alien civilization from the Alpha Centauri system. Known for their chaotic three-sun environment and dehydration survival abilities.

details.weaponry: Sophons, invasion fleet, advanced physics manipulation
quotes: The universe is not a fairy tale.
Civilization is a thin veneer over chaos.

name: Singer Civilization
description: A post-singularity alien civilization operating ~116 million light-years away. They enforce Dark Forest law with mathematical coldness, using dimensional weapons to annihilate detected civilizations. Before each strike, the Singer composes a final song - a haunting ritual of contemplation before cosmic genocide.

details.origin: Deep galaxy, approximately 116 million light-years from Earth
details.weaponry: Spacetime foils (dimensional collapse weapons), stellar-scale observation arrays
quotes: The Singer finished the song. Then activated the weapon.
I'm going to give you a piece of two-dimensional space.

name: Earth Humanity
description: The human civilization of Earth, struggling to survive in a hostile universe. Despite their technological limitations, they show remarkable adaptability and ingenuity.

details.weaponry: Nuclear weapons, space elevators, stellar-class warships
quotes: Give civilization to time, and time to civilization.
The universe is a dark forest.

name: The Returners
description: Ancient, decayed civilization existing within lightless stellar husks. They have 'returned from the dead' - survivors who fled so deeply into hiding that their biology and purpose have eroded into nihilistic despair. They believe in the futility of survival and spread philosophical poison to other civilizations.

details.weaponry: Memetic despair, communication sabotage, philosophical corruption
quotes: We have returned from the dead.
The universe is a grave, and every star is a tombstone.
We are dust that once thought.

name: Return Movement
description: A human faction dedicated to returning the universe to its original state. They possess advanced technology obtained through contact with higher-dimensional beings.

quotes: We must return the universe to its pristine state.

name: Edge World Civilization
description: A civilization existing at the edge of known space, adapted to the harsh conditions of the cosmic boundary. They serve as guardians of dimensional barriers.

details.form: Crystalline beings adapted to extreme conditions
quotes: We are the watchers at the edge of existence.
Some boundaries must never be crossed.
